      • startApp

        public void startApp(java.lang.String pkg,
                     java.lang.String clazz,
                     java.lang.String type,
                     java.lang.String title,
                     java.lang.String uri,
                     java.lang.String info)
        start app with package/class
        Parameters:
        pkg - package name
        clazz - activity class name
        type - video/* image/*
        title - name of video/image
        uri - video uri(local[/storage/emulated/0/Movies/test.mp4] or net[http://192.168.1.1/test.mp4] address)
        info - json data with JAppInfo
